title: Bug 6410 - File appears to be dirtied by code assist without any changes
description: When performing code assist in a Java file, the file is shown as dirtied even though no changes are made. Additionally, the code assist does not appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call, for example:

   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);

3. Press Ctrl+Space.

Expected Result: The code assist menu should appear without marking the file as dirtied if no changes are made during code assist.
